params._directory: A contract storing directories of terminals and controllers for each project.
params._projects: A contract which mints ERC-721's that represent project ownership and transfers.

set(uint256,uint256,(uint256,(bool,bool,.details: Only the owner or operator of a project, or the current controller contract of the project, can set its splits.The new splits must include any currently set splits that are locked.

params._domain: An identifier within which the splits should be considered active.
params._groupedSplits: An array of splits to set for any number of groups.
params._projectId: The ID of the project for which splits are being added.

params._domain: An identifier within which the returned splits should be considered active.
params._group: The identifying group of the splits.
params._projectId: The ID of the project to get splits for.

returns._0: An array of all splits for the project.

directory().notice: The directory of terminals and controllers for projects.

projects().notice: Mints ERC-721's that represent project ownership and transfers.

splitsOf(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Get all splits for the specified project ID, within the specified domain, for the specified group.

documentation.text: @notice Mints ERC-721's that represent project ownership and transfers.
@notice The directory of terminals and controllers for projects.
